vote.title: Appointment of Aaron Thomas, 315 S. 17th Street, Columbus, OH 43205, to serve on the Civilian Police Review Board, with a new term expiration date of April 30, 2023 (resume attached). (REPEALED BY ORD. A0090-2021; PASSED 5/10/2021)
